title: Fire erupts at Centaurus Mall
content:
ISLAMABAD, Oct 09 (APP):A fire broke out in Centaurs Mall on Sunday, the popular shopping center nestled at Blue area crossroads junction.
The fire abruptly started at the lower storeys in the late afternoon and according to eyewitnesses, people gathered inside different shopping outlets had to spree for their lives.
Fire brigade engines and local fire extinguishing machinery were being utilized for fire dousing process, however, fortunately no loss of life was reported.
Police has cordoned off entire access points to ensure safety of the public.
